HogWildHost.com - Offering 15% Off Virtual Private Servers (VPS) Hosting

HogWildHost Is Offering 15% Off Virtual Private Servers (VPS) Hosting


HogWildHost Virtual Private Servers are a great way to get yourself into a fully private server environment at a low cost.
Choose any operating system and a free control panel.

Visit us today: ORDER NOW

VPS Features
* Your VPS is connected to the HogWild network at full duplex -100 Mbps.
* Virtual Private Servers come with full root access when not fully-managed.
* Our servers run on Intel hardware with a minimum of two Xeon processors, 32+ GB of ECC Registered memory
and RAID-10 SAS-based hard drive configurations.
